___postInstallNotes.description: Post installation notes that would be useful to the user of this package.

___preInstallNotes.description: Pre installation notes that would be useful to the user of this package.

___framework.description: True if this package installs a new Mesos framework.

___icon-small.description: PNG icon URL, preferably 48 by 48 pixels.

items.description: PNG screen URL, preferably 1024 by 1024 pixels.

___icon-medium.description: PNG icon URL, preferably 128 by 128 pixels.

___icon-large.description: PNG icon URL, preferably 256 by 256 pixels.

___name.description: The name of the license. For example one of [Apache License Version 2.0 | MIT License | BSD License | Proprietary]

___url.description: The URL where the license can be accessed

___postUninstallNotes.description: Post uninstallation notes that would be useful to the user of this package.
